entities.name: Articque
entities.description: Target company in Project Inuk, provider of the Articque Location Intelligence Platform.

entities.name: Articque Platform
entities.description: A versatile Location Intelligence platform, unified and easy-to-use, accessible to any business user. It serves a wide range of business users in the private and public sector.

entities.name: Microsoft Excel
entities.description: Data source integrated with Articque Platform.

entities.description: Data source integrated with Articque Platform.

entities.description: Data source integrated with Articque Platform.

entities.description: Data source integrated with Articque Platform.

entities.description: Data source integrated with Articque Platform.

entities.name: Salesforce
entities.description: Data source integrated with Articque Platform.

entities.name: Marketing
entities.description: Representative use cases include: Strengthen distribution network performance (geo-merchandizing customer targeting, campaign performance, etc.); Competitive environment mapping and analysis through physical and digital data analysis.

entities.name: Sales
entities.description: Representative use cases include: Enhance sales performance (routing optimization, improving field team productivity, and territory planning, etc.) for a maximized operational efficiency; Monitor market developments through KPIs (penetration rates, actual sales vs objectives per area).

entities.name: Observatory
entities.description: Representative use cases include: Monitoring, analysis and dissemination of key indicators such as unemployment rate, age profile, real estate market trends or compensation statistics; Market researches made available to the public.

entities.name: Operational Excellence
entities.description: Representative use cases include: Human Resources – Developing internal mobility, monitoring employee attendance…; Supply Chain – Optimizing transport costs and selecting most suitable suppliers…; Information System – Ensuring data mapping and analysis.

entities.name: Private Sector Business Users
entities.description: Articque Platform serves a wide range of business users in the private sector.

entities.name: Public Sector Business Users
entities.description: Articque Platform serves a wide range of business users in the public sector.

entities.characteristics: Market served by platforms like Articque, catering to private and public sector business users for various analytical use cases.
